title: A foie gras parable
description: At the Taste3 conference, chef Dan Barber tells the story of a small farm in Spain that has found a humane way to produce foie gras. Raising his geese in a natural environment, farmer Eduardo Sousa embodies the kind of food production Barber believes in.
author: Dan Barber
keywords: TED, talks, entertainment, food, global issues, sustainability, Best of the Web
